short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Updates whitehouse.gov font styles to better match Trump's messaging.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension updates the fonts on whitehouse.gov to better match President Trump's messaging: Comic Sans and doom.

Privacy policy: this extension does not collect any data on you or your devices, and does not send any data to any third-party services. All it does is change fonts.

GitHub: https://github.com/webster/american-carnage
